item.description:
After Halloween, get in touch with your inner rebel and experience a most riotous tour through four centuries of protests, social violence and at times downright bad behavior.

We'll take to the streets and examine many of the lesser known Riots of Boston and street violence often fueled by the powerless who sought a voice over social, political, religious, and economic oppression.

Meet outside Park Street Station on the Common. Get your riot gear and join our mob mentality through the streets of Boston on this tour through anger, fear, rebellion, violence, and bad behavior.

Tour is $15 ($5 for Boston By Foot members). Torches and effigies optional.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for folks with BBF badges, bags, hats, etc.
item.name: Riots in Boston
